name: !!!Ants!!!
overview: In Ants you can become an ant and join the ranks to fight in battle between two warring ant colonies. Queens, workers, soldiers, guards, and drones all take to their roles when hundreds of ants clash together in battle. There are three game variations: Digging Ants, Nest Barrier, and Open Field. Time the production of ants so that they are sequenced strategically to sting the enemy queen, while defending your own. To win, be the first player to fatally wound your opponent’s queen or to overrun their nest. The game has four separate, varying difficulties to choose from. The game can be played against a computer AI opponent or another local player.
